GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.10.85
GSD.description:
IB/hfi1: Fix leak of rcvhdrtail_dummy_kvaddr

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.85 by commit 2c08271f4ed0e24633b3f81ceff61052b9d45efc, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 46b010d3eeb8eb29c740c4ef09c666485f5c07e6. For more details please see the references link.
